parameters.name: PWMaterialId1
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of the first IDs of the material to delete VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.

parameters.name: PWMaterialId2
parameters.description: VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported

title: IModelDocExtension.IDeleteDisplayStateSpecificRenderMaterial
description: Deletes the specified materials, using the IDs of the materials, from the active configuration.
signature:
System.Boolean IDeleteDisplayStateSpecificRenderMaterial( 
   System.Int32
IdCount
,
   ref System.Int32
PWMaterialId1
,
   ref System.Int32
PWMaterialId2
)

parameters.name: PWMaterialId1
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of the first IDs of the material to delete VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.

parameters.name: PWMaterialId2
parameters.description: VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported

returns: True if the materials are deleted, false if not
remarks:
Before calling this method, call:
IModelDocExtension::GetRenderMaterialsCount
to get the value for IdCount.
IRenderMaterial::GetMaterialIds
to the get the values for PWMaterialId1 and PWMaterialId2, the IDs of the materials added to the model.
